description:
Amazon Gold Rush: How I Sold $317,255.74 Last Year Part Time teaches you all about selling on Amazon... an opportunity that I believe is the easiest way to start and build a successful part time or full time online business today and rapidly build a full time income.

Why Amazon?

Amazon is the biggest online retailer in the world.

Last year, I sold $317,255.74 on Amazon and I did this working part time – 20 to 30 hours a week.

Amazon wants you to share in their growth and success. Just look at these sales figures for 3rd party merchants on Amazon:

  • In Q2 2015, 3rd party merchants sold 45% of all products on Amazon.
  • The gross sales of 3rd party merchants totaled $27.9 Billion dollars – a whopping 58% of total sales for that quarter.
  • Amazon has 285 Million active customers – meaning that they made purchases in the past year
  • Year over year sales grow dramatically – growing over 18% a year.

And most importantly, Amazon makes it easy for you to participate in their spectacular growth with several exciting seller partner programs including their Marketplace and Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) programs that let you offer just about any product ever made on their platform... all to help you become a success and grow your business.

This course takes you step by step through the knowledge you need to start building your Amazon empire.

It will teach you:

  • Why the Amazon opportunity is so great
  • The mechanics of starting your business and working with Amazon
  • The two most important business models for you to adopt when building your Amazon empire
  • How to understand the Amazon product catalog and how to turn that knowledge into even greater profits for your business
  • How to find, manage and maximize the profits from your inventory purchases
  • Build an understanding of customer shopping patterns, seasonal purchases and trend buying
  • Learning how to manage cash flow to grow your business as fast as possible with minimal risk.
  • How to use a variety of cash multipliers to supercharge your profits
  • Amazon feedback and performance metrics and what they mean to you as a seller.
  • And much more.

And best of all, this is not a static course. I invite you to participate by asking questions to ensure that you get maximum value from this course. And remember, when you purchase the course you get lifetime access to its contents including all its updates and growing knowledge base of student generated questions and instructor answers.

So who am I and why am I qualified to be your mentor on this fascinating and potentially very profitable business journey that you are about to undertake.

My name is Steven Chabotte. I started my full time entrepreneurial life back in 1997 – setting up my first eBay account, an ecommerce website and a mail order catalog. In 2005, I jumped on the Amazon opportunity. And I've never looked back.

Over the years, I sold just about everything you can imagine from coins to nutritional supplements to clothing to survival and camping supplies and sports equipment, grocery items, books, dvds, cd, jewelry. I even sold a Mercedes 500SL on eBay back in 2006. Basically if I could figure out a way to make a profit on a product and ship it safely, I sold it.

Selling on Amazon is one of the easiest business opportunities available to you today! All it takes is a proper success oriented education and a desire to succeed. I can provide the first part. It is up to you to provide the 2nd part.

And the course comes with Udemy's no questions asked 30 day guarantee so there is nothing to lose and so much to gain.

Get started on your success path today!

Jump on in and start collecting your share of the Amazon gold rush today.
title: Amazon Gold Rush: How to Build an Online Shop
